readable.title: 2474092890_6c0781a8ed
readable.content: a person holding a picture of a face in front of their own face sitting on a bench . A person sitting on a bench and holding a picture in front of their face . Someone is sitting on a wooden bench holding the picture of a face up in front of their own face . The person blocks his face with newspaper to avoid being photographed . The person is holding a picture in front of their face .
